name: Flag Wars 2 - Isle of Man vs Sicily
name_original: Flag Wars 2 - Isle of Man vs Sicily
description:
This game is part of a little series of videos where I make games with unusual programming languages. This one was made with Factor, a modern concatenative, stack-based programming language. This game is also powered by Raylib.

The two most popular triskelions will finally settle who is the most powerful!
